00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                         MtkDataBufferAllocate3D                           =

00017 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00018 #include <stdlib.h>
00019 
00035 MTKt_status MtkDataBufferAllocate3D(
00036   int nblock,  
00037   int nline,   
00038   int nsample, 
00039   MTKt_DataType datatype, 
00040   MTKt_DataBuffer3D *databuf  )
00041 {
00042   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00043   MTKt_DataBuffer3D dbuf = MTKT_DATABUFFER3D_INIT;
00044                 /* Data buffer structure */
00045   int datasize[] = MTKd_DataSize; /* Data size by data type */
00046   int i;            /* Index */
00047   int j;            /* Index */
00048   
00049   if (databuf == NULL)
00050     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00051 
00052   if (nline < 0)
00053     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00054 
00055   if (nsample < 0)
00056     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00057 
00058   if (nblock < 0)
00059     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS);
00060 
00061   dbuf.nblock = nblock;
00062   dbuf.nline = nline;
00063   dbuf.nsample = nsample;
00064   dbuf.datasize = datasize[datatype];
00065   dbuf.datatype = datatype;
00066 
00067   /* Create 2D Illiffe vector of sizeof(void *) to point to 3D buffer */
00068 
00069   /* Allocate 1D Illiffe vector */
00070   dbuf.vdata = (void ***)calloc(dbuf.nblock, sizeof(void **));
00071   if (dbuf.vdata == NULL)
00072     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00073 
00074   /* Allocate 2D Illiffe vector */
00075   dbuf.vdata[0] = (void **)calloc(dbuf.nblock * dbuf.nline, sizeof(void *));
00076   if (dbuf.vdata[0] == NULL)
00077     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00078 
00079   /* Connect Illiffe vector */
00080   for (i = 1; i < nblock; i++) {
00081     dbuf.vdata[i] = (void *)((unsigned char *)(dbuf.vdata[i-1]) +
00082                  dbuf.nline * sizeof(void *));
00083   }
00084 
00085   /* Create 3D buffer and point the 2D Illiffe vector to it */
00086 
00087   /* Allocate 3D buffer */
00088   dbuf.vdata[0][0] = (void *)calloc(dbuf.nblock * dbuf.nline * dbuf.nsample,
00089                     dbuf.datasize);
00090   if (dbuf.vdata[0][0] == NULL)
00091     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED);
00092 
00093   /* Connect 1D Illiffe vector */
00094   for (i = 1; i < nblock; i++) {
00095     dbuf.vdata[i][0] = (void *)((unsigned char *)(dbuf.vdata[i-1][0]) +
00096                 dbuf.nline * dbuf.nsample * dbuf.datasize);
00097   }
00098 
00099   /* Connect 2D Illiffe vector */
00100   for (i = 0; i < nblock; i++) {
00101     for (j = 1; j < nline; j++) {
00102       dbuf.vdata[i][j] = (void *)((unsigned char *)(dbuf.vdata[i][j-1]) +
00103                   dbuf.nsample * dbuf.datasize);
00104     }
00105   }
00106 
00107   /* Hook the union to the void data pointer */
00108   dbuf.data.v = dbuf.vdata;
00109   /* Hook the data pointer to the data */
00110   dbuf.dataptr = dbuf.vdata[0][0];
00111 
00112   *databuf = dbuf;
00113 
00114   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00115 
00116 ERROR_HANDLE:
00117   return status_code;
00118 }
